name: Pam's VAS
description: Pam’s VAS is truly dedicated to the Real Estate industry… …handling everything from BPOs, REO property valuations and REO property listings to REO property preservation and management. We can provide complete project management services or we can take on tasks that you and your staff do not have the time to handle. Pam's VAS provides complete real estate project management services for your entire real estate portfolio.
